topic.title: This Zite is pretty nice.
topic.body: If you want to have something you can't just clone a Zite and expect it to be great. You have to put the effort and build a community. @ssdifnskdjfnsdjk Seems to be doing so. Good job, keep going.

1571814102_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: Democracy is not a gift from the gods. Great things must be nourished and cared for.

1580176508_1PE7nD7YtXWzNdc1EggdBPaqWTYs6.body:
I could implement search but I'm not sure if the devs would accept a pull request for the zero talk.
We could have it just here nevertheless.

1520866054_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: You could use locabitcoin.com that's what I do. You interact direct with the seller. Of course you can't use it to short/daytrade/swing.
